Container.Name: network-optimizer
Container.Overview:
Network Optimizer - Automated network performance monitoring and optimization platform.
Features: - Network performance monitoring and analysis - Client speed test integration - Path analysis and optimization - Agent deployment and management
Requirements: - HOST_IP or HOST_NAME must be set for proper operation - Companion speedtest container recommended for full functionality

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the Network Optimizer web interface

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: SQLite database, configs, and license files

Config.Name: SSH Keys Directory
Config.Description: Optional: SSH keys for agent deployment

Config.Name: Logs Directory
Config.Description: Application logs

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone setting

Config.Name: Bind Localhost Only
Config.Description: Set to true to bind to localhost only (for reverse proxy)

Config.Name: App Password
Config.Description: Optional: Application password for authentication

Config.Name: Host IP
Config.Description: Host IP address for path analysis and CORS (required for client speed tests)

Config.Name: Host Name
Config.Description: Host name for path analysis and CORS (required for client speed tests)

Config.Name: Reverse Proxied Host Name
Config.Description: Reverse proxy hostname (e.g., optimizer.example.com) - overrides HOST_NAME for API URLs

Config.Name: OpenSpeedTest Port
Config.Description: Port where OpenSpeedTest is running

Config.Name: OpenSpeedTest Host
Config.Description: OpenSpeedTest host for CORS configuration

Config.Name: OpenSpeedTest HTTPS
Config.Description: Set to true if OpenSpeedTest uses HTTPS

Config.Name: OpenSpeedTest HTTPS Port
Config.Description: HTTPS port for OpenSpeedTest

Config.Name: iperf3 Server Enabled
Config.Description: Enable to accept client-initiated speed tests on port 5201

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical

Config.Name: App Log Level
Config.Description: Network Optimizer specific log level

Config.Name: Demo Mode Mappings
Config.Description: Optional: Demo mode configuration

Config.Name: InfluxDB URL
Config.Description: Optional: InfluxDB URL for metrics storage (e.g., http://localhost:8086)

Config.Name: InfluxDB Token
Config.Description: Optional: InfluxDB authentication token

Config.Name: InfluxDB Organization
Config.Description: Optional: InfluxDB organization name

Config.Name: InfluxDB Bucket
Config.Description: Optional: InfluxDB bucket name for storing metrics
